title: The GOOD OMENS Cast Reacts to Fan ‘Ships (Nerdist News Edition)
author: Nerdist

description:
We asked Neil Gaiman, David Tennant, Michael Sheen and more stars of Good Omens about their thoughts on the internet feverishly shipping their characters, the apocalypse, and much more.
